variants.Description in input context: This mutation alters protein structure and reduces stability.
This variant results in reduced protein levels and altered cellular localization.

Material used.Description: Multiple cell lines and patient samples were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein levels were reduced, and cellular localization was altered.

Technical replicates.Description: Multiple images were obtained per sample.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal protein level and cellular localization.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reduced protein level and altered cellular localization.
